name: collegial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a friendly relationship between colleagues (= people who work together): The organization has a welcoming collegial atmosphere.
used to describe a method of working in which responsibility is shared between several people: The new chair quickly upset committee members, who were used to a more collegial style.
